thursday.description: Discover the secrets behind some of the fandom's best YouTube channels and learn what it takes to bring your own pony video project to the next level.

thursday.event_name: The Most Metal 1980s Show Ever Invented: My Little Pony Generation 1
thursday.description: Take a trip through the crazy world of 1980s ponies where the most metal of monsters and darkest disasters of the series are fought.
Your memory of official and fan _My Little Pony_ songs will be put to the test to see if you can keep singing even after the music stops.

thursday.event_name: Chaos and Cuddles: Writing About Children and Families
thursday.description: Join a group of parents and fanfic authors as they discuss practical advice on capturing the different facets of children, parents, and families in your stories.
Join seasoned plush makers as they guide you step-by-step to make your own mini pony. All skill levels are welcome. Children under the age of 8 will not be allowed to sew. $10 material fee.
Try to figure out who the Changelings are in your group, and banish them before they take over your town. Based on the social game _Werewolf_.
With nothing more than a name and photograph, you must find, and take out your changeling target. But beware, out there in the crowd is another agent with you in their cross-hairs!
Welcome to the realm of Everglow where we'll run some simple adventures using premade characters.

thursday.event_name: Ultimate Ultra Mega Pony Trivia Challenge (of Ultimate Destiny)!
thursday.description: Compete with the rest of the audience in a live smartphone trivia face-off to win awesome pony prizes and fulfill your ultimate destiny as the first-ever pony trivia Ultra Mega Master.

thursday.event_name: Writing Comedy: How to Make Your Horses Hilarious
thursday.description: Learn how comedy can convey serious subject matter and provoke thoughts. Seasoned writers will show you the difference between random and "randumb"—because even Pinkie Pie follows inner logic.
Using D&D 5E ruleset, step into the horseshoes of ordinary background ponies and attempt to survive whatever disaster the Mane 6 is thwarting this time.

thursday.event_name: Tails of Equestria: The Equestria Games
thursday.description: Become a pony in the officially licensed kid-friendly RPG for _Friendship is Magic_ and work together to bring the Equestria Games to Ponyville.

thursday.event_name: Art, Audio, and Animatics: Fan Media in Motion
thursday.description: Get the inside scoop on the production side of fandom video creation as various fan artists, narrators, and editors share optimal ways to organize and produce high-quality motion projects.
Fill in the blanks and witness some of the [adjective] _MLP_ scenes like you've never [verb] before!
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) with ready made characters or make your own, features homebrew pony races.
With a few easy steps learn how to make TuTu skirts from tulle fabric and have a cosplay accessory to wear for the whole event. No sewing skills required. $15 material fee.

thursday.event_name: Make Your Own Cutie Mark Bottlecap Keychains!
thursday.description: Create your own trendy cutie mark keychain. Pick your favorite cutie mark and we'll teach you how to create your very own keychain.
Bring your original pony character and move into Ponyville for a beginner-friendly tabletop RPG about friendship and fun.

thursday.event_name: Remembrance: The Art of Audio Dramas and Radio Plays
thursday.description: Dive down the rabbit hole of feels as the Dorito Queen and friends reveal their secrets on how to create a successful audio drama production on YouTube.
Invade Equestria with science as physicists explore the whimsical world of _MLP_ and attempt to answer the all important question: can we science this?
You are about to pull off a heist that makes _Mission: Impossible_ look like a kid's show. The only issue? You're all bears. Good luck, agents!
Write for an hour about how Discord would fix a random episode of _MLP_ and be a part of the chaotic collaborative writing activity. Everything provided, no experience needed.

Rock out in Mane Event's Hall and witness the most immersive fandom musical experience ever in a three-night sixteen-hour concert.

7:00pm Hollowpoint; 7:40pm Seventh Element; 8:15pm Faulty B2B PegasYs; 8:50pm John Kenza; 9:25pm YourEnigma; 10:00pm GeekBrony; 10:35pm loophoof; 11:10pm Lavender Harmony; 11:45pm Elevative; 12:20am FLIGHTRUSH; 12:55am R3CTIFIER; 1:30am Chang31ing
Watch four panelists play _MLP_-themed _Dungeons & Dragons_ on stage. There will be laughs, dangers, and shenanigans.
Join the cast of _MLP in a Nutshell_ as they answer your questions and create badly-drawn stick ponies. What the hay.
Overcome the worst the wasteland has to throw at you in this tabletop RPG that focuses on characters over combat.
Experience a slice of Ponyville life in this tabletop game brought to you by Equestria Inspired.

thursday.event_name: Tails of Equestria: The Equestria Games
thursday.description: Become a pony in the officially licensed kid-friendly RPG for _Friendship is Magic_ and work together to bring the Equestria Games to Ponyville.

Create your own _MLP_ canvas painting in a step-by-step workshop. All materials will be provided, including smocks to protect your clothing. This activity has a $15 participation fee. Beginners and advanced artists alike are welcome!
Players must gather supplies and weapons from an ancient convention center in order to survive the wastelands in a war-swept post-BronyCon world.
Leave your friendships at the door and earn those precious stars for a shot to reign as the Super Mario Party Champion. Spots are limited to only 32 entrants so sign up early.

Learn the difference between being a community icon and a leader. MagpiePony, DustyKatt, SilverQuill, TheLostNarrator, and other fandom trailblazers are here to discuss good leadership practices and how they serve their communities.

thursday.event_name: Fanfiction Foundations: Root Your Story in the World
thursday.description: Explore how reflecting on and respecting source material can help stories become more accessible to their audience, find unexpected inspiration, and be more stable overall.
Try to figure out who the Changelings are in your group, and banish them before they take over your town. Based on the social game _Werewolf_.

thursday.event_name: Keep Calm and Kill the Princess
thursday.description: Welcome to Cadance's Secret Castle, where pony royalty go to vacation and relax. Unfortunately, some rebels have infiltrated the staff and are there to make an attempt on the Princesses' lives.
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) as wonderful insane pyromaniac goblins. Perfect for new players.
Join for a big sketch session, full of drawing, sketchbook trades, and more. Meet up with old friends and make some new ones, as we draw the night away.
Get your groove on! The creators behind _Saturday Morning Ponies_ are back with an all-new feature-length film ponifying Disney's _The Emperor's New Groove_.
Take an in depth look at the _MLP_ timeline as fans detail a definitive chronology of the entire series from start to near finish.

thursday.event_name: Don't Deal with a Dragon: Shadowrun with Ponies
thursday.description: Welcome to the fifth age, where magic and technology meet and mega corporations "help" run the world. In this setting, you play as one of many specialists known as shadowrunners who do the dirty work the rich and powerful don't want to get caught doing.
Welcome to Cadance's Secret Castle, where pony royalty go to vacation and relax. You've joined the elite ranks of the Royal Maid Service, and you'll definitely be put through your paces.
Come join members of Team KP as they break down and discuss how a wide range of content is made.

thursday.event_name: History of Fan Conventions: From Worldcon to BronyCon
thursday.description: From the first science fiction conventions of the 1930s to the the cons of today, learn the history of the rise of fan conventions. Receive a special convention timeline poster available while supplies last.
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) as wonderful insane pyromaniac goblins. Perfect for new players.

thursday.event_name: You Suck, and Why That's Okay!
thursday.description: Thwart intimidation and newbie jitters in this casual discussion on the emotional and mental hurdles of starting out.

thursday.event_name: Super Smash School: The Ultimate Introduction
thursday.description: Learn strategies and tips from an experienced _Smash Ultimate_ competitor that you can use to improve your game. A great panel to go to before the _Super Smash Bros._ tournament.

Tragedy strikes while investigating a strange phenomenon. Will you be able to survive to the last? Or will you perish, deepening the mystery of who or what is making ponies perish? Grin is a Horror Story told together as a group.

friday.description: Dine with the Princesses of Equestria as they host a wonderful Summer Sun Celebration Breakfast meet and greet. Enjoy a variety of breakfast foods and beverages with the royal court. Attendees with be given the chance for a souvenir photo op to remember the event. Brunch tickets must be purchased in advance at bronycon.org/cafe.

Learn the basics of voice acting with Nicole Oliver, Michelle Creber, and Rebecca Shoichet as they teach our Community Guests how to hone their voice and develop the skills needed to voice a character.

The incredible Brass Knuckles (the female Iron Will) turns doormats into dynamos! Learn how _My Little Pony_ and _Boku no Hero Academia_ both value hard work, assertiveness, and understanding yourself. Then use those lessons to go beyond—Plus Ultra!
The game of fun with a pun with a pony twist comes to BronyCon!

friday.event_name: Don't Rest Your Hooves: A Game of Existential Horror and Ponies
friday.description: Learn to play _Don't Rest Your Hooves_, a fan-made supplement for the psychological roleplaying game _Don't Rest Your Head_.
You are about to pull off a heist that makes _Mission: Impossible_ look like a kid's show. The only issue? You're all bears. Good luck, agents!
Get your brain moving fast in this classic mashup of two puzzle game classics. If you think you're the biggest egghead of the convention, put your skills to the test.

friday.event_name: Guided Painting with Cosmo Cat (12 & Under)
friday.description: Create your own _MLP_ canvas painting in a step-by-step workshop. All materials will be provided, including smocks to protect your clothing. This activity has a $15 participation fee. Beginners and advanced artists alike are welcome!
Dark forces are on the rise and heroes are called to arms to stem the growing threat. It is now a race against the sands of time before they run out!
Meet TheLostNarrator, MagpiePony, and ObabScribbler.

friday.event_name: Storytime with Shining Armor and Princess Cadance
friday.description: Shining Armor and Princess Cadance are coming all the way from the Crystal Empire to read a story with you.

Smash your way to the top and claim the title of Smash Champion!

Meet NCMares.

Welcome to a candid panel with Cathy Weseluck, where she will hang out and share life lessons, stories, and whimsical tales of her experiences. Prepare to be inspired and have good laughs along the way.
Uh-oh! We're suddenly seeing doubles upon doubles of Pinkie Pies. Pinkie (and Pinkie, and Pinkie, and Pinkie) are ready to answer questions and have some fun, fun, fun!

friday.event_name: So, You Want to Learn How to Dance at the Gala
friday.description: Grand Galloping Gala's very own Spike teaches a fast, easy, and fun way to learn how to ballroom dance. Whether it is your first time or not, Spike is here to get those hooves, claws, and paws moving.
Quick wit and epic fails ahead as Saberspark, ACRacebest, Black Gryph0n, and others perform live improv comedy. It's all made up, who knows what will happen on stage!

See a discussion between YouTubers about the _My Little Pony_ toy line from the very beginning up to the most recent release of _Friendship is Magic_ toys.
Learn how to create and perform your own sock puppet creation.

Make some slime and learn why it works! This may be a smidge messy.
Fight back against an unknown enemy called "The Converted" with five other allies across three scenarios in the upcoming tile-based strategy game _The Ethereal Metropolis_.

friday.event_name: Tails of Equestria: Neighpon's Rat Race
friday.description: The Cutie Map sends players on a friendship quest to Neighpon to resolve a centuries long grudge that began with the original twelve champions of The Great Race.

friday.event_name: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic!
friday.description: With nearly a thousand songs available, all you need to do is grab the microphone and get the party started.

friday.event_name: From The Matrix to Silence of the Lambs: Movies in Pony Voices
friday.description: Witness YouTube voice actors joining forces to re-enact scenes from some of Hollywood's best movies in _My Little Pony_ voices.
Watch a showcase of pony videos with their creators and learn the secret sauce behind their editing techniques.
Witness history as five chairs of BronyCon history come together on one stage to unpack the history of the fandom's first and largest convention.

friday.event_name: Keep Calm and Kill the Princess
friday.description: Welcome to Cadance's Secret Castle, where pony royalty go to vacation and relax. Unfortunately, some rebels have infiltrated the staff and are there to make an attempt on the Princesses' lives.

friday.event_name: Show the Power of Friendship: Share a Friendship Bracelet
friday.description: Make special friendship bracelets to share with your friends. $5 material fee.
Play as epic heroes from Old Equestria in a tabletop adventure brought to you by Equestria Inspired, featuring the Celestial Circle.

friday.event_name: Make Your Own Cutie Mark Bottlecap Keychains!
friday.description: Create your own trendy cutie mark keychain. Pick your favorite cutie mark and we'll teach you how to create your very own keychain.
Prepare your best jokes and roasts as we say "thank you" to our favorite writer, M.A Larson, in a truly chaotic evening.
Join musicians as they reminisce about BronyPalooza and discuss how the fandom music scene has evolved over the years.

friday.event_name: The Rainbow of Light and Darkness: G1 in Perspective
friday.description: Listen in on thought provoking analysis of the strengths and weaknesses of the animated media, comics, and toyline of the first generation of _My Little Pony_.

On Behalf of the Princess of Friendship—Twilight Sparkle—we cordially invite you to attend this year's Grand Galloping Gala. Join us for dancing, wonderful music, and so much more. After all… what could possibly go wrong? Formal attire is required, see full dress code at [bronycon.org/gala](https://bronycon.org/gala).
Impress the judges for a chance to be featured in the _BronyCon: Show Stoppers_ talent show on Sunday.
Try out your poker face against ponies from all over. This Texas Hold'em tournament is open to players of any ability, with fabulous prizes at the end of the night.
It's Baltimare Arcade's Friday night main event! Weather you're competing or a spectator, this ungulate fighting game is sure to satisfy.
Team up with your tablemates to score points and win prizes in a prompt-based drawing game. Skill not required, points based on laughs.
Meet Jesse Nowack, JHaller, JakeWhyMan, Minty Root, and Alumx.
Overcome the worst the wasteland has to throw at you in this tabletop RPG that focuses on characters over combat.

friday.event_name: Let's Create a Bad Fanfiction Together, LIVE!
friday.description: Help brony YouTubers MagpiePony and TheLostNarrator write the most ridiculous and hilarious pony fanfiction ever—the after dark version!
There's no telling what stories will be told at this podcast Q&A, where members of the _Semi-Perfect Podcast_ will delight you with their antics.

friday.event_name: The Art of Living off Ponies
friday.description: BronyCon staff artist newcomer Shiba Roll explains how they went from doodling ponies for fun to being a part of the official MLP trading cards and to drawing art for conventions all over.
Players must gather supplies and weapons from an ancient convention center in order to survive the wastelands in a war-swept post-BronyCon world.
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) with ready made characters or make your own, features homebrew pony races.
Experience a slice of Ponyville life in this tabletop game brought to you by Equestria Inspired.
Help a game master search through their tabletop collection and find something that looks fun to play together.

friday.event_name: The Rainbooms' Most Excellent Adventure (Teenagers from Outer Space)
friday.description: A key event in history has been changed and now the fabric of reality is unraveling. Get to work, the Earth needs your bodacious, radical, and most excellent assistance!
Join six random anonymous friends from your favorite pony-themed image board as they host a live podcast where they'll discuss the show, the fandom, and the dankest horse memes.

friday.event_name: After the Fact Live! Feeling Pinkie Keen
friday.description: Join SilverQuill for a live review of season one episode _Feeling Pinkie Keen_ where he'll discuss the symbols, philosophies, and pratfalls.

friday.event_name: Seeing Through Your Characters' Eyes II: The Finer-er Points of Perspective
friday.description: Perspective is a fundamental choice in storytelling that has many subtle effects authors can use to improve the flow of their story. Learn where the devil lies in the details of keeping the prose aligned with the chosen perspective.

friday.event_name: Don't Deal with a Dragon: Shadowrun with Ponies
friday.description: Welcome to the fifth age, where magic and technology meet and mega corporations "help" run the world. In this setting, you play as one of many specialists known as shadowrunners who do the dirty work the rich and powerful don't want to get caught doing.
Try to figure out who the Changelings are in your group, and banish them before they take over your town. Based on the social game _Werewolf_.
Join various members of the community as they work to define "Horse Drama" and reminisce about their favorite fandom drama from years past.

Comic artist Trish Forstner and the Design Team behind BronyCon discuss how art and design come together to make the look and feel of the convention we all love. Find out what powered our creative process and the fun that was had behind the scenes.
Join the minds behind the _My Little Meets_ and _Smash (Unexpected)_ series and learn their process on how to make a unexpected experience in animation.

Rock out in Mane Event's Hall and witness the most immersive fandom musical experience ever in a three-night sixteen-hour concert.

Learn the basics of crafting your own cider, beer, wine, and soft drinks at home. See just how easy it can be to start homebrewing on a budget as we discuss what you need to brew from start to finish.
Look back at last nine years of the brony fandom—from the early memes, to timeless fanfiction, and all the fun had in between.

friday.event_name: Dead Tree Studios: Fallout Equestria PnP
friday.description: Greetings Wastelanders! Join Dead Tree Studios as they give another thrilling update on _Fallout Equestria PnP_ and a glimpse into their future projects.

friday.event_name: DrinkPonies Part Deux: The Last Call
friday.description: Last call, bronies! Witness the RiffPonies and their gaggle of friends attempt to answer ridiculous _Friendship is Magic_ trivia questions with drinks.

_Scootertrix the Abridged_ fans unite and be the first to catch the series finale with the team behind the project and give this pony abridged era a proper send off.

Join Community Guests JakeWhyMan and JHaller as they explain the world of furries.
Analyze the best and worst ships the fandom has ever produced from 2010 to today in this panel packed with comedy, games, prizes, and a whole lot of questionable OTPs.
Play some buckball with the Apple siblings.
Master of the track? Prove it in this Mario Kart 8 Deluxe tournament. Be sure not to miss those coins!
Voice actors do a blind reading of an original script, written by none other than Community Guest Horizon!
Using aspects of the _Pathfinder_ system, players will immerse themselves in the world of _Avatar and Korra_ after Kuvira's defeat. Knowledge of _Pathfinder_ helpful but not required.
Bring your best Harmony-format deck and compete for packs and other awesome prizes. This is a Tier 1 event, Tournament Floor rules will be in effect. Prizes will be awarded based on match record.
Welcome to the realm of Everglow where we'll run some simple adventures using premade characters.
We'll provide the rubber and charms, you'll pick up to eight and make it all your own. $5 material fee.

saturday.event_name: Quill and Lefty's Lip Sync Battles
saturday.description: Watch some of your favorite community members duke it out in a lip-syncing battle royale.

saturday.event_name: From Star Wars to Harry Potter: Movies in Pony Voices
saturday.description: Witness YouTube voice actors joining forces to re-enact scenes from some of Hollywood's best movies in _My Little Pony_ voices.
Ask all your burning Apple-related questions in an interactive Q&A with the whole Apple family.

Meet DustyKatt, SilverQuill, Foal Papers, and Scope.
Explore the creative process of making a story come to life. In this panel, Andy Price, Tony Fleecs, and Sara Richard will outline how they go from idea, to concept, to work of art.
Make crafts, dance, and pose for pictures with Fluttershy.
Take a small break from convention excitement and recharge your batteries with an entertaining meditation. The possibilities are limited only by your subconscious imagination.

saturday.event_name: An Introduction to the Voice Acting Industry
saturday.description: Get an inside look at the world of professional voice acting with voice talent agent Ralph Streich as he covers the ins and outs of the industry, demo reels, auditions, and marketing. Q&A to follow.
Hear various members the fandom discuss their unique talents, how they influence each other's mediums, and the magic that happens when they collaborate together.

saturday.event_name: The Final BronyCon PMV Contest Results Show
saturday.description: The Collaboratory is here showcasing this year's best entries in their Pony Music Video contest.
Your mission, should you choose to accept it: dismantle the cube with your other Agents, and discover the card's magical properties through duels; tests of wit and cunning await you!
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) with ready made characters or make your own, features homebrew pony races.
Design some Zap Apples that'll make Granny Smith proud!
Bring your original pony character and move into Ponyville for a beginner-friendly tabletop RPG about friendship and fun.
Cosplayers have the chance to show off their amazing cosplay costume for all to see and appreciate. So come by and show us how you work "ze magiks!"
Learn more about Lauren Faust, your favorite showrunner and creator, as we discuss some of her favorite memories and experiences in the pony universe and beyond.

Based on the popular Rooster Teeth game show, watch two teams of your favorite bronies in a battle of improv, memes, and pony knowledge. Come for free laughs, stay for the public humiliation of the losing team.
_Bronies React_ is a series that brings together multiple personalities from the Fandom. Enjoy the antics that occur when the team gets together.
Learn the ins and outs to creating your own bushable pony custom figure through live demonstration.
Join Rebecca Shoichet and rock out to all your favorite _My Little Pony_ and _Equestria Girls_ jams.
Play as epic heroes from Old Equestria in a tabletop adventure brought to you by Equestria Inspired, featuring the Celestial Circle.

Create your own _MLP_ canvas painting in a step-by-step workshop. All materials will be provided, including smocks to protect your clothing. This activity has a $15 participation fee. Beginners and advanced artists alike are welcome!
Fight back against an unknown enemy called "The Converted" with five other allies across three scenarios in the upcoming tile-based strategy game _The Ethereal Metropolis_.

saturday.event_name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate Charity Tournament
saturday.description: Compete for glory and a good cause pitting cartoon ungulates against each other in an ultimate brawl. Top prize will receive a full size Isabelle Plush (handmade by Emberfall Plush). Proceeds go to CureSearch.

saturday.event_name: My Little Karaoke: Singing is Magic!
saturday.description: With nearly a thousand songs available, all you need to do is grab the microphone and get the party started.
Be drawn in as Tony Fleecs, Andy Price, Sara Richard, and Trish Forstner compete head-to-head in an ultimate drawing competition. Who will scribble and doodle their way to the top? Come find out!

Be the first to witness the seventh installment of the _Ponies: The Anthology_, a one-hour video compilation of MLP jokes, parodies, and pop culture references. Consider camping in line the night before to guarantee a seat!
Strut your stuff and show off your cosplay in front of an audience at this non-competitive event.

saturday.event_name: Present at the Creation: Promoting the Original My Little Pony Series
saturday.description: Enjoy rare behind-the-scenes videos promoting the original _My Little Pony_ series. See Tony Randall and Sandy Duncan recording their lines for the _Rescue from Midnight Castle_ special as producer Joe Strike shares his experiences helping introduce _MLP_ to the world.
Grab your dice, salty snacks, and sugary sodas, it's time to watch as Dungeon Master Josh Scorcher takes panelists through a live Brony _D&D_ campaign.

saturday.event_name: Keep Calm and Kill the Princess
saturday.description: Welcome to Cadance's Secret Castle, where pony royalty go to vacation and relax. Unfortunately, some rebels have infiltrated the staff and are there to make an attempt on the Princesses' lives.

Autograph: $20
Photograph: $20
Autograph + Photo Combo: $30
Draw some pictures with BronyCon's very own Blank Canvas.
Experience a slice of Ponyville life in this tabletop game brought to you by Equestria Inspired.

Meet other creatives and swap supplies or finished pony-related projects. Artists (traditional, digital, fiber), crafters, and other makers are welcome to join. No money will be exchanged, just swaps/trades.

saturday.event_name: Dramatic Info Email Readings & Social Media Stories from BronyCon PR
saturday.description: Bond over the awkwardness of customer service on the front line with BronyCon's Public Relations team as members past and present read out and discuss some of their most memorable, heartwarming, and shocking messages received.

After 6 years it's all come down to this: the final round of BronyCon's Appleoosa Hold'em Poker tournament. Join a special advanced-level tournament with a one-of-a-kind exclusive grand prize on the line. All are welcome, however this session is geared towards experienced poker players.
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) with ready made characters or make your own, features homebrew pony races.

saturday.event_name: Shadowboxes Building with The Paper Pony
saturday.description: Build your very own paper cut shadowboxes with The Paper Pony! $15 material fee, space limited.
Meet ACRacebest, Saberspark, Jesse Nowack, JHaller, and JakeWhyMan.
2D animators on one side, 3D animators on the other. This is the final confrontation. Join them as they debate on the use of 2D or 3D to animate ponies.

saturday.event_name: Bronies United Against Bullying: It Gets Better
saturday.description: You are not alone. Bronies United Against Bullying is an opportunity to tell stories, to speak out against bullying and to share ways to overcome it, because it will get better. Keep your hope alive. Stay strong and grow with us.

saturday.event_name: Operation S.H.I.P.F.I.C.: Create a TSSSF Card
saturday.description: Assist in a special mission to design two brand new _Twilight Sparkle's Secret Shipfic Folder_ cards to be distributed later this year. Participants will also receive free promo card while supplies last.

saturday.event_name: Let's play Jackbox! After Dark Edition
saturday.description: Play Jackbox games with the _MLP_ Crew and Community guests after dark.

Rock out in Mane Event's Hall and witness the most immersive fandom musical experience ever in a three-night sixteen-hour concert.

8:00pm Michelle Creber, Black Gryph0n, + Baasik, 9:40pm BronyPalooza Superband, 1:00am Eurobeat Brony
Players must gather supplies and weapons from an ancient convention center in order to survive the wastelands in a war-swept post-BronyCon world.
You are about to pull off a heist that makes _Mission: Impossible_ look like a kid's show. The only issue? You're all bears. Good luck, agents!
Learn how to create and perform your own sock puppet creation.
Meet Monochromatic, Horizon, and Skywriter.
Laugh along as your favorite ponies go head-to-head to see who reigns supreme in a live _MLP_-themed game of _SuperFight_.
Community Guest and YouTube expert SilverQuill is here to give a crash course on production tools, technique, and presentation that can help bolster a YouTube channel.
Watch as panelists reflect on their favorite characters, stories, art, and more from the community of Tumblr ask blogs.
Try to figure out who the Changelings are in your group, and banish them before they take over your town. Based on the social game _Werewolf_.

Pack an extra pair of culottes and tuck your chainsaw down deeper in that feather duster, because Iron Will wants you for a mission in babysitting like no other—where much will be smashed and war hangs in the balance.
Help a game master search through their tabletop collection and find something that looks fun to play together.
Join seasoned plush makers as they guide you step-by-step to make your own mini pony. All skill levels are welcome. Children under the age of 8 will not be allowed to sew. $10 material fee.
All dressed up with nowhere to go? Put your cosplay to the test and fight with/against against your fellow cosplayers in an action-oriented cosplay battle.
Shipping is magic and this panel is all about creating crack ships. Who knows, you might leave with a new OTP.

saturday.event_name: Don't Deal with a Dragon: Shadowrun with Ponies
saturday.description: Welcome to the fifth age, where magic and technology meet and mega corporations "help" run the world. In this setting, you play as one of many specialists known as shadowrunners who do the dirty work the rich and powerful don't want to get caught doing.
Play _Pathfinder_ (D&D 3.75) as wonderful insane pyromaniac goblins. Perfect for new players.
A panel of starving artists. A bloodthirsty crowd. Requests for the charity auction. What could possibly go wrong?
From apps to websites to full games, the _MLP_ fandom has spawned amazing collaborative projects. Hear stories from programmers on projects like these, and find out how to contribute in your own way.
_Magic: The Gathering_ and ponies have more similarities than you might think! Join Josh Scorcher as he analyzes your favorite _MLP_ characters through the lens of _MTG_.

saturday.event_name: Aprilverse Live: An Interactive Fanfic Reading Experience
saturday.description: Join in for a very special fanfic reading in which the audience contributes to a Mad Libs inspired adventure through the perils of The Last BronyCon!
Join Team KP for a workshop-style panel on the process of fan projects from initial ideation to finding teammates to aid in making your vision a reality.
With the conclusion of _MLP:FiM_ on the horizon, join panelists as they explore what lies ahead for the next decade of cartoons.

saturday.event_name: It's in Our Hooves Now: The Importance of Fanfiction After the Series Ends
saturday.description: Learn the importance of writing in a universe where the canon has stopped, and embracing the legacy of a phenomenal series.
Welcome to Cadance's Secret Castle, where pony royalty go to vacation and relax. You've joined the elite ranks of the Royal Maid Service, and you'll definitely be put through your paces.
Join Community Guests Jesse Nowack, ACRacebest, and Saberspark as they answer questions that can't be asked in the daylight.
Watch as two artists draw new ponies live on stage based on direction from the audience.
Watch the world premiere of three brand new animatic shorts from the cast and crew of _Bride of Discord_ and _Daughter of Discord_.

saturday.event_name: Distant Worlds: Writing for Non-MLP Settings
saturday.description: Listen in as four popular fanfic writers advise on how to write for worlds other than Equestria and how to help your characters stand out without pastel coats.
Enjoy an _MLP_-themed burlesque cabaret show that showcases all types of talent, while being sexy. Bring your positive energy and love because all are equal and everyone is beautiful at the Tavern.

Tragedy strikes while investigating a strange phenomenon. Will you be able to survive to the last? Or will you perish, deepening the mystery of who or what is making ponies perish? Grin is a Horror Story told together as a group.

sunday.description: Come play Jackbox games with the _MLP_ crew and Community Guests.
Order in the court! The honorable judge Twilight invites you to serve out justice at Ponyville Court. Be a part of the show as the jury and choose which ponies are innocent or guilty.
Based on the hit game show, join ten lucky audience members as they guess what others think about your favorite cartoon.
Help keep the music scene burning bright with _Ponies at Dawn_ as they give a crash course in the group's history and discuss their top-selling compilation albums on Bandcamp.

An exciting way for younger attendees to experience charitable giving while scoring some great stuff. This auction will be at a slower pace so that the kids can do their own bidding—with adult's supervision of course! Up for bid are _MLP_ items meant for children to wear or play with. All proceeds go to CureSearch for Children's Cancer. Cash only please.
Using D&D 5E ruleset, step into the horseshoes of ordinary background ponies and attempt to survive whatever disaster the Mane 6 is thwarting this time.

Finally, panel all about Applejack—yeehaw! Join Community Guests JHaller, JakeWhyMan, and their friends as they make the case for why AJ is truly best pony.
Get your questions answered by the world's foremost "Bronyologist". What does the future hold for the fandom?

sunday.event_name: Pokémon Ultra Sun & Ultra Moon Tournament

Join our friend M.A. Larson as you work together to create a story. Story prompts available but imagination is key as a story is crafted one sentence at a time.

Jump through a portal to a land that awakens while you sleep as four bronies from the other side of the world take you through the adventures, creations, and conventions of Southeast Asia.

sunday.description: Hear all about Hasbro's struggles, strange decisions, successes, and where they went wrong in an informative historical discussion of the _MLP_ toy line.
